frontMatter.title: A Distributed Systems Reading List
frontMatter.summary: I often argue that the toughest thing about distributed systems is changing the way you think. The below is a collection of material I've found useful for motivating these changes.

next.title: 本人的YouTube频道: 麦兜搞IT
next.summary: 本人的YouTube频道借宝地广告一波，欢迎感兴趣的同学订阅，目前正在制作一系列Ansible入门的教程。
